Package peregrine.reduce

Handles sorting, merging, and reducing shuffle data.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
SortListener  
 

Class Summary
FullKeyComparator  
ReduceRunner Run a reduce over the the given partition.
SortEntry When merging, keep track of each key and the values it supports.
SortResult Take the result of a sort request, and potentially merge values and when that value is complete emit and write it to disk.
 

Package peregrine.reduce Description

Handles sorting, merging, and reducing shuffle data.
